item.title: Don't we need DS? Summary
item.description: The original article is here I think this article will be a trigger of next datascience courses DS is attracting more and more people every day, also from a different domains. Sometimes, those people doesn’t have a PhD or a degree, and of course they could solve ML/DL problems because they are smart! (such Elon Musk :-) ). ML/DL/AI are the new buzzword, and all people want it, though they don’t know why or how…
